item.description: We invite you to come meet us and learn more about what we do, how we do it, and how you can join. This will be a great opportunity to meet our engineers, hiring managers, learn about our culture, and find out about the exciting opportunities AWS has to offer! Have a drink and appetizers on us, but don't forget to bring your resume and have a chance to win a Kindle Fire.

group.name: The Boston Amazon Web Services Meetup Group

item.name: Amazon AWS Team will be in Boston!
